House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07972
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE CREATION/FORMATION OF BARANGAY TOURISM AND INVESTMENTS COUNCILS IN THE COUNTRYSIDE, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Provides barangays to directly participate in the promotion and development of the country’s tourism potentials by empowering them to decide for themselves what are best for their communities and collectively acting on initiatives they are capable of undertaking.
